document_data.name: Hoteo
document_data.mainbody: '''Hoteo''' was an emissary of the [[Celestial Bureaucracy]] sent to the [[Fochu Peninsula]] in [[Wa]] to stop the rebel [[coiled dragon]] [[Za-Jikku]].
document_data.Description: At least in his [[human]] guise, Hoteo appeared as an overweight [[monk]] carrying a sack over his shoulder.
document_data.Personality: Hoteo was remembered for his happy demeanor.
document_data.Possessions: Hoteo crafted a powerful magic weapon, the ''[[Copper Hammer of Hoteo]]'' as a means to defeat Za-Jikko.
document_data.History: Sometime before {{YearlinkConvert|770|WY}}, the Celestial Bureaucracy sent Hoteo to Wa to put a stop to the rebel behaviors of the dragon Za-Jikku. While appearing as a human monk, Hoteo founded the village of [[Kareki]] and crafted his magic [[copper]] hammer. However, when the time came for him to face Za-Jikku, the dragon overpowered him. The Bureaucracy transformed Hoteo into a statue carved from a [[granite]] boulder that rose from the earth fully crafted and carrying the copper hammer in its hands at the center of Kareki.
